item.title: Birds await the death of a thing
item.summary: A note describing how birds (and specifically crows) await the death of a thing by sitting opposite it.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-32
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: birds such as crows wait for the person to die
await the death of a thing
such as crows wait for people to die
await the death of a thing
